"Horsa": "This vanguard unit is mostly made up of Aelio ARKS. I'm probably the only one from Retem."
"That's why I've gotta put myself out here. Missions are rough when you're on your own."
"Hey, I heard the news. You've certainly been busy, huh?"
"Even among the troops here, you're the talk of the town."
"That's why I figure I should ask you for some help. Can you do me a solid and hear me out?"
"I'm counting on you to take care of those Red Containers.  Just find out what's inside them."
"As many as you can find. Obviously, I'm talking about the ones in Kvaris."
"I see. Well, it is what it is. Another time then, I suppose."
"Whoa, you've been busy. With this, I'll be able to give the boss a good report."
"Thanks. You really saved my hide here. I definitely owe you one after this."
"Thanks again for handling those containers. The boss seemed satisfied as well."
"Us Retem ARKS always pay our dues. You ever need any help, just say the word."
